description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Mousse Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Slice,Seafood free,Low salt,Christmas,Tree nut free,Chocolate,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Chocolate Mousse Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g spreadable cream cheese, at room temperature
0.33 cup cocoa powder (use 1/4 cup for recipe and remainder to dust)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease a 22x31cm slice tray and line with baking paper. Break biscuits into a food processor and process until fine crumbs form. Add butter and process until combined. Press mixture into base of tray. Bake for 10 minutes. Set aside to cool completely.
Heat cream in a small saucepan until bubbles appear around the side of the pan. Remove from heat and set aside.

Separate 2 of the eggs. Place 2 egg yolks, reserving whites, and 1 egg in a food processor with sugar, cornflour and cocoa. Process until smooth and creamy. With motor running, gradually add warm cream. Return mixture to saucepan and stir over low heat for 5 minutes until it thickens like custard. Cover surface with plastic and cool for 10 minutes. Whisk in cream cheese.
Dissolve gelatine in 2 tbs boiling water. Stir into custard. Whisk egg whites until stiff peaks form, then fold into custard mixture. Pour over base and chill for 3 hours or until set.
Lift slice out of tray and dust with extra cocoa (see tip, below). Cut into squares.
